# bcmaps

An [R](https://www.r-project.org) package of spatial map layers for
British Columbia.

`bcmaps` provides access to various spatial layers of British Columbia,
such as administrative boundaries, natural resource management
boundaries, watercourses, census boundaries, etc. All layers are
available as `sf` objects in the [BC
Albers](https://spatialreference.org/ref/epsg/3005/) projection, which
is the B.C. Government standard.

Most layers are accessed directly from the [B.C. Data
Catalogue](https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/) using the
[bcdata](https://github.com/bcgov/bcdata) R package under the hood. See
each layerâ€™s individual help file for more detail.

> ***IMPORTANT NOTE** Support for Spatial objects (`sp`) was removed in
> {bcmaps} v1.3.0. Please use `sf` objects with {bcmaps}.* A discussion
> on the evolution of the spatial software stack in R can be found here:
> <https://r-spatial.org/r/2022/04/12/evolution.html>.

## Installation

You can install `bcmaps` from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("bcmaps")
```

To install the development version of the `bcmaps` package, you need to
install the `remotes` package then the `bcmaps` package.

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("bcgov/bcmaps")
```

## Quick Start

To see the layers that are available, run the
[`available_layers()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/available_layers.md)
function:

``` r
library(bcmaps)
available_layers()
```

Most layers are accessible by a shortcut function by the same name as
the object. Then you can use the data as you would any `sf` object.

``` r
library(sf)

bc <- bc_bound()
plot(st_geometry(bc))
```

![A map of the outline of British
Columbia.](reference/figures/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png)

## Vignettes

[Getting Started with
`bcmaps`](https://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/articles/bcmaps.html)  
[Working with `bcmaps` layers and point
data](https://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/articles/add_points.html)

You can also view vignettes by typing `browseVignettes("bcmaps")` in
your R session after you install `bcmaps`.

## Getting Help or Reporting an Issue

To report bugs/issues/feature requests, please file an
[issue](https://github.com/bcgov/bcmaps/issues/).

## How to Contribute

Pull requests of new B.C. layers are welcome. If you would like to
contribute to the package, please see our
[CONTRIBUTING](https://github.com/bcgov/bcmaps/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)
guidelines.

Please note that this project is released with a [Contributor Code of
Conduct](https://github.com/bcgov/bcmaps/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.

## Source Data

The source datasets used in this package come from various sources under
open licences, including the [B.C. Data
Catalalogue](https://data.gov.bc.ca) ([Open Government Licence - British
Columbia](https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content?id=A519A56BC2BF44E4A008B33FCF527F61))
and [Statistics Canada](https://www.statcan.gc.ca/start) ([Statistics
Canada Open Licence
Agreement](https://www.statcan.gc.ca/en/terms-conditions/open-licence)).
See the `data-raw` folder for details on each source dataset.


# Package index

## B.C. Layers

Various administrative and natural resource boundaries of B.C.

- [`available_layers()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/available_layers.md)
  : List available data layers
- [`get_layer()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/get_layer.md)
  : Get a B.C. spatial layer
- [`airzones()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/airzones.md) :
  British Columbia Air Zones
- [`bc_bound()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bc_bound.md) :
  BC Boundary
- [`bc_bound_hres()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bc_bound_hres.md)
  : BC Boundary - High Resolution
- [`bc_cities()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bc_cities.md)
  : BC Major Cities Points
- [`bec()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bec.md) : British
  Columbia BEC Map
- [`census_dissemination_area()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/census_dissemination_area.md)
  : Current Census Dissemination Areas
- [`census_dissemination_block()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/census_dissemination_block.md)
  : Current Census Dissemination Blocks
- [`census_division()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/census_division.md)
  : Current Census Division Boundaries
- [`census_economic()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/census_economic.md)
  : Current Census Economic Region Boundaries
- [`census_metropolitan_area()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/census_metropolitan_area.md)
  : Current Census Metropolitan Areas
- [`census_subdivision()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/census_subdivision.md)
  : Current Census Subdivision Boundaries
- [`census_tract()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/census_tract.md)
  : Current Census Tract Boundaries
- [`ecoprovinces()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/ecoprovinces.md)
  : British Columbia Ecoprovinces
- [`ecoregions()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/ecoregions.md)
  : British Columbia Ecoregions
- [`ecosections()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/ecosections.md)
  : British Columbia Ecosections
- [`fsa()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/fsa.md) : British
  Columbia Forward Sortation Areas
- [`gw_aquifers()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/gw_aquifers.md)
  : British Columbia's developed ground water aquifers
- [`health_chsa()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/health_chsa.md)
  : Community Health Service Areas - CHSA
- [`health_ha()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/health_ha.md)
  : Health Authority Boundaries
- [`health_hsda()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/health_hsda.md)
  : Health Service Delivery Area Boundaries
- [`health_lha()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/health_lha.md)
  : Local Health Area Boundaries
- [`hydrozones()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/hydrozones.md)
  : Hydrologic Zone Boundaries of British Columbia
- [`mapsheets_250K()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/mapsheets_250K.md)
  : NTS 250K Grid - Digital Baseline Mapping at 1:250,000 (NTS)
- [`mapsheets_50K()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/mapsheets_50K.md)
  : NTS 50K Grid - Digital Baseline Mapping at 1:50,000 (NTS)
- [`municipalities()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/municipalities.md)
  : British Columbia Municipalities
- [`nr_areas()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/nr_areas.md) :
  British Columbia Natural Resource (NR) Areas
- [`nr_districts()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/nr_districts.md)
  : British Columbia Natural Resource (NR) Districts
- [`nr_regions()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/nr_regions.md)
  : British Columbia Natural Resource (NR) Regions
- [`regional_districts()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/regional_districts.md)
  : British Columbia Regional Districts
- [`tsa()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/tsa.md) : British
  Columbia Timber Supply Areas and TSA Blocks
- [`water_districts()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/water_districts.md)
  : British Columbia's Water Management Districts
- [`water_precincts()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/water_precincts.md)
  : British Columbia's Water Management Precincts
- [`watercourses_15M()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/watercourses_15M.md)
  : British Columbia watercourses at 1:15M scale
- [`watercourses_5M()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/watercourses_5M.md)
  : British Columbia watercourses at 1:5M scale
- [`wsc_drainages()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/wsc_drainages.md)
  : Water Survey of Canada Sub-Sub-Drainage Areas

## Canadian Digital Elevation Data (CDED)

Digital Elevation Model (DEM) of British Columbia

- [`cded()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/cded.md) : Canadian
  Digital Elevation Model (CDED)

- [`cded_stars()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/cded_stars.md)
  :

  Get Canadian Digital Elevation Model (CDED) as a `stars` object

- [`cded_terra()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/cded_terra.md)
  :

  Get Canadian Digital Elevation Model (CDED) as a `terra` object

- [`vrt_files()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/vrt_files.md)
  : List the files that a vrt is built on

- [`vrt_info()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/vrt_info.md) :
  Get metadata about a .vrt file

## Cache Management

Utilities to manage your cached layers

- [`delete_cache()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/delete_cache.md)
  [`show_cached_files()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/delete_cache.md)
  : View and delete cached files

## Utility functions

Various utility functions for working with BC data

- [`bc_area()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bc_area.md) :
  The size of British Columbia
- [`bc_bbox()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bc_bbox.md) :
  Get an extent/bounding box for British Columbia
- [`transform_bc_albers()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/transform_bc_albers.md)
  : Transform a Spatial\* object to BC Albers projection
- [`utm_convert()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/utm_convert.md)
  : Convert a data.frame of UTM coordinates to an sf object with a
  single CRS
- [`combine_nr_rd()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/combine_nr_rd.md)
  : Combine Northern Rockies Regional Municipality with Regional
  Districts
- [`bc_neighbours()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bc_neighbours.md)
  : Boundary of British Columbia, provinces/states and the portion of
  the Pacific Ocean that borders British Columbia
- [`bec_colours()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bec_colours.md)
  [`bec_colors()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/bec_colours.md)
  : Biogeoclimatic Zone Colours

## Raster utilities

Functions for specific raster operations

- [`raster_by_poly()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/raster_by_poly.md)
  : Overlay a SpatialPolygonsDataFrame or sf polygons layer on a raster
  layer and clip the raster to each polygon. Optionally done in parallel
- [`summarize_raster_list()`](http://bcgov.github.io/bcmaps/reference/summarize_raster_list.md)
  : Summarize a list of rasters into a list of numeric vectors
